full_summary:
### Fire Alarm Maintenance Service Tender

**Call Upon Tender ID:** 21301-25-4546068
**Tender Title:** Service d'entretien du système d'alarme incendie

**Publication Date:** November 27, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM E.S.T.
**Contract Term:** April 1, 2024 - March 31, 2026, with two (2) one-year extension options

**Organization:** Correctional Service Canada
**Address:** 250 Montée St-François, Laval, QC H7C 1S5, Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Objective:** The Correctional Service of Canada requires a service provider to maintain and repair the fire alarm system at its operational sites, including the Federal Training Centre and the Centre de la petite enfance des Câlins, ensuring the safety of staff, offenders, and visitors.

**Services Required:** 
• Perform annual inspection of the fire alarm system according to CAN/UCL 536-04 standard.
• Repair deficiencies resulting from the inspection.
• Provide 24/7 urgent repair services.

**Estimated Quantity:** Refer to the solicitation document for details.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Panama, and Peru.

**Security Requirements:** None.

**Submission Requirements:** Interested suppliers can obtain the complete tender package from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Documents:** The tender package, including the solicitation document and associated documents, can be downloaded from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Contact Information:** For inquiries and tender submissions, please contact:
Karine Clément, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer
Service Correctionnel du Canada
514-235-8177
karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca
